string-array.name: loading_texts
string-array.item: Let\'s open this in a superior streaming service…
From Spotify to another streaming service…
Switching to the better streaming service…
Switching to the streaming service for cool kids…
Wait, I think we better open this in another streaming service…

resources.string: This app makes sure that Spotify links automatically open in another streaming service. The first time you open a Spotify link after installing this app, and Spotify is not installed, Android will suggest that you open links with LinkConverterForSpotify by default. Choose this option to ensure the best possible functionality of this app. (You can also change the default apps for opening spotify links later in the settings). \n\nThe desired streaming service can be easily selected below:
This app uses the great API from odesli.co
Spotify, AppleMusic, Tidal, Deezer, AmazonMusic and YouTubeMusic are trademarks of their respective owners. This app is not affiliated with these companies or trademarks.
